about_the_game:
This DLC pack contains a digital art collection of multiple high resolution (suitable for desktop backgrounds) .png and .psd images showcasing concept art, early storyboards, and deleted concepts and characters.

It also includes storyboards and preproduction videos of the Road Redemption kickstarter trailer.

Finally, it includes early gameplay videos of Road Redemption in it's pre-alpha state.

To locate the DLC please follow these instructions -

Right click on the Road Redemption listing in your Steam Game library, then select Properties>Local Files>Browse Local Files. This should take you to the ArtBook folder.
